response:
"warum gibt es noch immer unternehmen, die unsere personenbezogenen daten sammeln und verkaufen? #datenschutz #privatsphäre"

("why are there still companies that collect and sell our personal data? #dataprivacy #privacy")

this post critically examines the issue of protecting personal information regarding data privacy. it questions why companies are still allowed to collect and sell personal data without proper consent or regard for individuals' privacy. the hashtags #datenschutz (data privacy) and #privatsphäre (privacy) are used to reach a wider audience and to connect the post to ongoing conversations around these topics.
